column1: On [[2 December]] [[1955]], [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] wrote '''[[Letters not published in "The Letters of J.R.R. Tolkien"
column2: a letter]] to Elizabeth Jennings''', Tolkien's childhood friend.<ref name=CG>{{CG
column6: articlename=J.R.R. Tolkien Collection: Other Tolkien Writings, 1911-1976

column1: *'''Subject:''' Tolkien congratulates Jennings on the publication of her poetry book ''A Way of Looking'' and discusses the merits of [[W.H. Auden]]'s ''[[List of books in Tolkien's library#The Shield of Achilles
column2: Shield of Achilles]]'', and mentions the review of both books in ''[[Time and Tide (3 December 1955)

column1: *'''Publication:''' The letter is reproduced in ''[[The Arts Council Collection of Modern Literary Manuscripts 1963-1972]]''. A description of the letter appeared in ''[[The J.R.R. Tolkien Companion and Guide
column2: The J.R.R. Tolkien Companion and Guide: Chronology]]''.
